p.p: A code that describes Authority of Lasting Power of Attorney.

p.strong: This is a preliminary set of values, for the full list consult the latest published version of the SNOMED CT subset with Original ID 47771000000138.

concept.displayName: Has appointed person with personal welfare lasting power of attorney (Mental Capacity Act 2005) (finding)
Has appointed person with personal welfare lasting power of attorney with authority for life sustaining decisions (Mental Capacity Act 2005) (finding)
